item.description: Enjoy a spectacular two hour riverboat sunset cruise on CT River in Haddam on the River Quest, refreshments served. Arrive 4:30 pm for 5 pm sharp departure. Adm. $40. Fundraiser for Old Saybrook Lions Club. Make reservations by Sept. 20, call Shirley 860 434-2871. Directions to boat landing: I 91S to left Exit 22S (Rt. 9S), take Exit 7 (ramp 3 miles long), exit end take left onto Rt. 82, at first light turn right onto Bridge Road/Rt. 82, go .4 miles and turn right just after railroad tracks into Eagle Landing State Park (before East Haddam Swing Bridge).
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be near the boat landing.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Sunset Swallow Migration Evening Cruise
